thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 3 of 10
thread.title: Anonymous

author: Anonymous
title: Anonymous
text:
I highly recommend this trip. Below are the positive and negatives:
Positives:
- Skipper was flexible, had a lot of knowledge of the area and accommodating for all passengers.
- Locations / islands are amazing and the best way to see them all is via sailing.
- Boat was large enough to avoid feeling cramped and each cabin had it's own toilet and shower.
Negatives
- The Trip Notes Intrepid provided were in accurate. For example - the details on where to meet on the first day were incorrect. The notes also mentioned that some meals were included however this was not the case.
- The first day was disappointing due to lack of organisation for purchasing of food and location of the first night wasn't anything great.
- Although the vessel was large enough, it was a bit dated and comfort of the bedding could be improved.
